casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 653
N. I., INC. (Formerly Northern Industries, Inc.), Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
Melvin Schwartz, Joseph K. Pierce, Baskin, Boreman, Wilner, Sachs, Gondelman & Craig, John P. Klee, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
R. Scott Shearer, Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
